name: jsrl
description: JavaScript Roguelike Boilerplate - The basics to start building your own

scripts.package-linux: npm run pre-package && electron-packager dist JSRL --overwrite --platform=linux --out=dist-builds
scripts.package-mac: npm run pre-package && electron-packager dist JSRL --overwrite --platform=darwin --out=dist-builds
scripts.package-win: npm run pre-package && electron-packager dist JSRL --asar --overwrite --platform=win32 --out=dist-builds --icon=./src/html/favicon.ico
